    • Constructor Detail

      • DisplayBot

        public DisplayBot()
        Register my commands and set an default action for unknown commands send to the bot. Default action executes the HelpCommand.

    • Method Detail

      • getICommandRegistry

        public org.telegram.telegrambots.bots.commands.ICommandRegistry getICommandRegistry()

        Returns:
        The ICommandRegistry of this bot instance.

      • processNonCommandUpdate

        public void processNonCommandUpdate(org.telegram.telegrambots.api.objects.Update update)
        Gets called when a text message is received, instead of a command. It checks if the user used a command which needs further information by the user and if that is the case, calls the corresponding method and gives it the update.
        Specified by:
        processNonCommandUpdate in class org.telegram.telegrambots.bots.TelegramLongPollingCommandBot
        Parameters:
        update - The received update.

      • getBotUsername

        public java.lang.String getBotUsername()
        Gets called if the username of the bot is needed. The returned value is defined in the config file.
        Returns:
        The bot's username.

      • getBotToken

        public java.lang.String getBotToken()
        Gets called if the token of the bot is needed. The returned value is defined in the config file.
        Specified by:
        getBotToken in interface org.telegram.telegrambots.generics.LongPollingBot
        Specified by:
        getBotToken in class org.telegram.telegrambots.bots.DefaultAbsSender
